subtitle: A Practical Guide to Building Intelligent Systems

chapters.chapter_description: This chapter provides an overview of machine learning and its applications. It also covers the different types of machine learning algorithms and their use cases.

subchapters.subchapter_description: This subchapter defines machine learning and its importance in today's world.
This subchapter covers the different types of machine learning algorithms, including supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning.

chapters.chapter_description: This chapter covers the basics of Python programming and its use in machine learning. It also introduces the popular Python libraries used in machine learning.

subchapters.subchapter_description: This subchapter covers the basics of Python programming, including variables, data types, and control structures.
This subchapter introduces the popular Python libraries used in machine learning, including NumPy, Pandas, and Matplotlib.

chapters.chapter_description: This chapter covers the different techniques used to preprocess data for machine learning. It also covers data cleaning, feature scaling, and feature selection.

subchapters.subchapter_description: This subchapter covers the different techniques used to clean data, including handling missing values and outliers.
This subchapter covers the different techniques used to scale features, including normalization and standardization.
This subchapter covers the different techniques used to select features, including univariate and recursive feature elimination.

chapters.chapter_description: This chapter covers the different supervised learning algorithms, including linear regression, logistic regression, decision trees, and random forests.

subchapters.subchapter_description: This subchapter covers linear regression and its use in predicting continuous variables.
This subchapter covers logistic regression and its use in predicting binary outcomes.
This subchapter covers decision trees and their use in classification and regression problems.
This subchapter covers random forests and their use in classification and regression problems.

chapters.chapter_description: This chapter covers the different unsupervised learning algorithms, including k-means clustering, hierarchical clustering, and principal component analysis.

subchapters.subchapter_description: This subchapter covers k-means clustering and its use in grouping similar data points.
This subchapter covers hierarchical clustering and its use in grouping similar data points.
This subchapter covers principal component analysis and its use in reducing the dimensionality of data.

chapters.chapter_description: This chapter covers the basics of deep learning and its use in building neural networks. It also covers popular deep learning frameworks, including TensorFlow and Keras.

subchapters.subchapter_description: This subchapter covers the basics of deep learning and its use in building neural networks.
This subchapter covers TensorFlow and its use in building deep learning models.
This subchapter covers Keras and its use in building deep learning models.

chapters.chapter_description: This chapter covers the basics of reinforcement learning and its use in building intelligent systems. It also covers popular reinforcement learning algorithms, including Q-learning and SARSA.

subchapters.subchapter_description: This subchapter covers the basics of reinforcement learning and its use in building intelligent systems.
This subchapter covers Q-learning and its use in building intelligent systems.
This subchapter covers SARSA and its use in building intelligent systems.
